blurb: Legends whisper of wisdom beyond mortal reach. In King Solomon, your judgment will be tested by riddles, power, and the weight of truth.

S01.text: The throne room is silent as two figures step forward, each claiming the same truth.

S02.text: The story is compelling, but something feels incomplete.

S03.text: The second tale contradicts the first, forcing you to weigh wisdom over emotion.
